title: [CLIENT] Issue with Kalista in the store page
body: Just noticed a small bug in the store. If you limit the champions on the champions tab of the store to "Marksman", Kalista doesn't appear. However, she does appear when you do the same in the champion section of your summoner profile.

replies.body:
Hiya XenonMonkey! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently aware of this issue and are working to resolve it! :]
